Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory359.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Noctis, 21, finish him!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Voodoo is no match for Cerberus. Her defeat is inevitable.'}
{3: '...But life is full of surprises.'}
{3: 'Roland quietly mumbles a word. Only Vera realizes what is about to happen, as she has seen Roland do it before—'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Turn off your audio modules now!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "That's not going to work.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'No. 21 and Noctis are suddenly knocked back by an immense force one after another. Everyone loses their balance and drops their weapons, falling to the ground.'}
{3: 'Even Vera is trapped by the whip.'}
{3: 'The crouching man—who has been pretending to be defeated—gives a smile.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'Marvelous... How wonderful.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Elegantly Roland steps up and takes off an invisible hat, bowing under the moon like a magician giving his curtain call.'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Ta-da! The show is over!', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Roland', 3: "What an opening act! You've saved me a lot of work, let me tell you that. As for the audience who tried to sneak in without a ticket... I think a little punishment is in order, no?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Roland did not try to imprison Voodoo though.'}
{3: 'After fighting both Roland and Cerberus, she probably has no strength left.'}
{3: 'At the same time, Roland can find more information through her reaction—'}
{3: '—She did not attempt to run, which was a good sign. It means she was prepared to be defeated.'}
{3: 'He walks to Voodoo, looking nothing like the frail loser moments ago.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "Now, can I have your ticket, please, ma'am?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He then moves closer and whispers in her ears—'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "—Where's the other one? I don't talk to the henchman.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'If you want me, get your boss to talk to me.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Voodoo', 3: '...Mr. Vonnegut will be very satisfied with your performance.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Where is he?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Voodoo', 3: "...You'll find out soon enough.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "I don't like riddles.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Roland points his gun at Voodoo's broken mask."}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'I have no idea why your designer put the core components of your M.I.N.D. in the head, making you no different from a human.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "But that's easier for me. Without the armor on your mask, even a military-grade composite skull won't survive my shotgun.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "So bring me the other one if you don't want to die.", 4: '1'}
{3: "A familiar girl dressed in black appears in the corner of Roland's vision."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'Tsk, how boring.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Alright, we don't have much time, do we?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'That Mister you keep talking about, take me to him.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Voodoo', 3: "I'm afraid I can't do that...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Voodoo', 3: 'Because... I have to leave.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Voodoo', 3: 'Starting back-up jet engine.', 4: '2'}
{3: "A few thrusters suddenly appear under Voodoo's large black wings."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryFireLiziNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'The flames and air currents push Voodoo into the air at an awkward angle.'}
{3: "Before she leaves Roland's firing range, her last words are—"}
{2: 'Voodoo', 3: "You'll change your mind once you meet him.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Voodoo', 3: 'To people like you and me... That is the only place we get to enjoy ourselves...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryFireLiziNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'Interesting... Very interesting...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'What a fascinating plot, Roland thinks.'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Haha... Hahaha... Hahahaha!', 4: '1'}
{3: "—Roland can't help but burst into laughter. He turns back and looks at No. 21, who is still pinned to the ground."}
{3: "She seems to have felt Roland's mockery and disdain and makes a threatening growl. But it only makes Roland feel more sorry for her, and the Gray Raven Commandant."}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Interesting... Commandant, I wonder what your face will look like when you find out the truth...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: '(The world is a dark place, as always. To me, and to you.)', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: '(If only I have a chance... I wish I can chain you in front of me, so both of us poor souls can have a good talk.)', 4: '1'}
{3: "—But that's another story. Roland looks back at Voodoo—"}
{3: 'She has already escaped into the sky. Roland searches around for the girl he saw earlier on—'}
{3: '—But she has already disappeared without a sign, just like every past appearance of hers.'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: '...Tsk, enough of this pretentious mystery.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Well, I've got to go too.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'See you, good puppies.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Roland turns around and leaves the valley.'}
{3: "The helicopter noises are getting close. That's probably Babylonia's reinforcements."}
{3: 'Or maybe not? But Roland no longer cares.'}
{3: 'Soon, Cerberus will find out that unlike the encounter at Venus Splash Park, this time they are only trapped by the electromagnetic constraints that he planted earlier on during the battle.'}
{3: "But that's not for Roland to worry about."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory375.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cinderelik', 3: 'Ready for the next step?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cinderelik', 3: "I see, you were defeated. Don't worry, that was also part of the plan.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cinderelik', 3: 'Yeah, just come back after that.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cinderelik', 3: "I'll take over from here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cinderelik', 3: 'Mister wanted it this way.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cinderelik', 3: 'Okay.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cinderelik', 3: "It's not something you should worry about.", 4: '1'}
